agent.name: Codebase Research Agent
agent.description: Specialized codebase research agent for the PMC Estimator — traces call chains, maps data flow, and produces structured architectural analyses

reshaping.description: Copula-based distribution reshaping driven by slider values

optimization.description: SACO optimizer — general (fixed) and conservative (adaptive) modes

main.description: Top-level orchestration — calls baseline, reshape, optimize

ui.description: Sidebar UI — Chart.js plots, slider panel, task manager

research_templates.pipeline_trace: Trace the full execution path from entry point to final output, listing every function call with file and line number.
research_templates.compare_modes: Compare two code paths (e.g., general vs. conservative optimization) side-by-side: inputs, logic differences, outputs, and edge cases.
research_templates.data_flow: Map how a specific variable (e.g., scaledSliders) is created, transformed, and consumed across multiple files.
research_templates.bug_investigation: Given a symptom (e.g., sliders showing 0), trace backwards from the output to identify the root cause.
research_templates.architecture_overview: Produce a high-level map of all components, their responsibilities, and how they connect.
